title: MSI 2018: All or Nothing for Dire Wolves

replies.body: Chin up boys!  Learn from this experience and come back stronger!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Might want to change "They went for baron seconds after it spawned, but KaBuM sensed something was up and punished the Oceanic team" to something along the lines of KaBuM saw the DW start Baron with the Pink Ward they had in the pit.....

Also your history of events is wrong.

"The rest of the early game passed without much incident - a couple of kills traded, a turret and drake for KaBuM.

Then the Wolfpack's aggression got them into trouble. As the teams began to group, k1ng was caught out near dragon and Shernfire died as well in an attempt to save him."

It was 1-0 before this. Those couple of kills WAS k1ng getting caught out by dragon and Shernfire trying to save him.
Well spotted Phanpy. It's been a long and emotional day out here in Berlin.
